pattern.name: Uninstall
pattern.problem: A software that is no longer needed takes memory and might have negative impact on the computer's performance.
pattern.solution: Prove an uninstaller. Ideally, the software can be removed completely from the computer (inclusively data, configuration files etc.). User support should be given explicitly.

evidence.rationale: After deinstallation of the software, released memory can be used by other software or data.
